meanings.definition: The state or quality of being old-fashioned or outdated.
meanings.sent1: The fustiness of the antique shop made it feel like stepping back in time.
meanings.sent2: The fustiness of his ideas about technology showed he was resistant to change.
meanings.sent3: The fustiness of the old library books made them seem like treasures from the past.
meanings.sent4: The fustiness of tradition hung heavy in the air during the ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The fustiness of the vintage clothing store added charm to the neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: The basement had a strong fustiness that made it unpleasant to stay for long.
meanings.sent2: The attic was filled with the fustiness of old boxes and forgotten memories.
meanings.sent3: The fustiness of the room made everyone wrinkle their noses in disgust.
meanings.sent4: The fustiness of the abandoned house hinted at its long history of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The fustiness of the vintage store gave it a unique, nostalgic scent.

meanings.sent1: Her style slowly fustinessed over the years, reflecting her love for classic fashion.
meanings.sent2: The technology fustinessed quickly, leaving many devices obsolete.
meanings.sent3: The idea of using floppy disks now seems to fustiness in the age of cloud storage.
meanings.sent4: As time passed, the once trendy restaurant fustinessed into obscurity.
meanings.sent5: The once popular song fustinessed into a nostalgic classic over time.
